product_description: 30 cm grey wallclock with white dial and black numbering in bold and mini & hour hand with minute time divisions in red color.

copy_data.primary_copy: Transform any room with our sleek grey wall clock. Bold black numbers pop against crisp white, while red accents add modern flair.
copy_data.headline: Time Made Beautiful, Precision Made Simple
copy_data.description: This contemporary 30cm wall clock combines elegant design with perfect readability. Red minute markers and bold numerals ensure you'll never miss a moment.

claude_optimized_prompt: Photorealistic modern living room with a 30cm grey wall clock mounted on a light gray wall, white dial face, bold black numbers, red minute markers. Natural sunlight streaming through large windows. Minimalist Scandinavian furniture, muted tones. Professional photography, soft shadows, rule of thirds composition, marketing-ready.

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic depiction of a modern living room styled in a minimalist Scandinavian design. The room features muted tones and has large windows with natural sunlight streaming in, creating soft shadows across the space. The focal point is a 30cm grey wall clock mounted on a light gray wall. The clock has a clean white dial face, bold black numbers, and red minute markers. The furniture includes a sleek Scandinavian sofa and coffee table, all done in cohesive muted tones. The composition follows the rule of thirds, presenting a professional, marketing-ready aesthetic suitable for advertising.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: Photorealistic modern living room with a 30cm grey wall clock mounted on a light gray wall, white dial face, bold black numbers, red minute markers. Natural sunlight streaming through large windows. Minimalist Scandinavian furniture, muted tones. Professional photography, soft shadows, rule of thirds composition, marketing-ready.
